summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingGive BackElemis' Pro-Collagen Hydrating Night Cream is a rich, nourishing night cream that reveals a firmer-looking, radiant complexion whilst delivering intense moisture.
details: DetailsBenefitsFirmsSmoothesReplenishesKey IngredientsLaminara Digitata Extract: Laminara Digitata is a brown seaweed rich in polysaccarides and is known to have anti-ageing propertiesRed Algae: Rich in minerals and trace elements including calcium and magnesium, for skin that feels smoothPadina Pavonica: A brown algae found on the Mediterranean coast that is known to support the feeling of hydrationResearch ResultsClinically proven to deliver instant and 24-hour hydration*Clinically proven to significantly reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles in 14 days*91% agreed this product left their skin feeling toned and conditioned***Independent Clinical Trials 2021. Results based on 37 people over 4 weeks**Independent User Trials 2021. Results base on 116 people over 4 weeksItem 2599129How To UseTo be used every evening after cleansing. Warm a pea-sized amount between palms. Gently smooth over face, neck and d√©collet√© in upward strokes.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Glycerin, Isononyl Isononanoate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Lauryl Laurate, Ethyl Macadamiate, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Fragrance (Parfum), Butylene Glycol, Laminaria Digitata Extract, Chlorphenesin, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Oil Unsaponifiables, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil Unsaponifiables, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Phytosterols, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Padina Pavonica Thallus Extract, Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Citronellol, Linalool, Collagen Amino Acids, Lithothamnion Calcareum Powder, Mimosa Tenuiflora Bark Extract, Mannitol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Tocopherol, Sorbitan Oleate, Geraniol, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Citric Acid, Malic Acid, Diatomaceous Earth, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Sodium Hydroxide, Zinc Sulfate, Hexapeptide-9.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: To be used every evening after cleansing. Warm a pea-sized amount between palms. Gently smooth over face, neck and d√©collet√© in upward strokes.

reviews.headline: Mixed feelings
reviews.comments:
I do like how rich this feels on my skin. It does help soften. It does have a very strong perfume scent. This is somewhat bothersome for me.
I wish it was a lighter fragrance. I would probably not purchase again because of this. This may not bother others.

reviews.headline: I love everything about it but the smell!
reviews.comments: I have been wanting to buy the cream for a long time. When I saw that it was 50% off at Ulta I had to make the purchase. When I first opened the jar, I was so taken back by the smell, I almost returned it on the spot. I decided to give it a try and although the smell is overwhelmingly fragrant, like fake gardenias it dissipates quickly. The cream is so lightweight and SO hydrating I'm keeping it. My skin feels plumped up in the morning and there is no residue or stickiness left on my face. I take pride in keeping up with my skincare routine and this is worth the splurge. I only omitted a star for the overwhelming floral scent.

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: I first experienced Elemis over 10 years ago in the UK where it originates. I loved it! And so would purchase whenever I was lucky enough to pass through Heathrow or went on a cruise (frequently sold in the ship spa). I was very happy to discover Ulta carries this excellent brand. Thank you!!

reviews.headline: Cheap perfumey fragrance, cream not as rich as expected
reviews.comments: I love that they don't test on animals or include animal products, but I hate the overpowering smell of cheap perfume. They should have gone for something botanical. The cream itself isn't rich enough for night use. Disappointing.

reviews.headline: An absolute MUST HAVE!
reviews.comments: Compared to the regular Pro-Collagen Marine Cream, the ELEMIS Pro-Collagen Night Cream feels so much richer and more nourishing. I've been using it for a few weeks, and I'm honestly blown away. The moment I apply it, my skin drinks it in, leaving no greasy residue just a velvety, deeply hydrated feel. By morning, my complexion looks plumper, firmer, and more radiant, and the fine lines around my eyes and mouth seem noticeably softer. I also love the subtle scent it's soothing without being overpowering, making my nightly routine feel luxurious. The blend of marine extracts and nourishing oils really makes a difference; my skin feels smoother, conditioned, and elastic. Honestly, this cream has completely transformed my skin overnight, and I can't imagine going to bed without it now. Gifted By Elemis

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: Complimentary from Elemis. Great cream! It's so good! I apply at night and in the morning my skin looks like new. Smells good, easy to apply, great results. I loved it! My skin is combination type, so this cream is great.

reviews.headline: Does Wonders ü´∂
reviews.comments: This night cream does wonders!! I am such a big fan of elemis products but this one excels in every possible aspect! Gifted By Elemis. My skin has never been more smooth and radiant. I have been using it since months and probably would never stop because it feels ultra lightweight on the skin yet hydrates enough for that supple look!

reviews.headline: Five stars
reviews.comments: Rich, silky, and deeply hydrating‚Äîthis night cream leaves my skin soft, smooth, and noticeably more plump by morning. A little goes a long way, and the light floral scent feels like a spa. Total staple in my routine. Gifted by Elemis

reviews.headline: Great night cream
reviews.comments: Gorgeous night cream. Didn't break me out or seem to clog my pores. Didn't give my sensitive skin any sort of reaction. The texture is thick and rich while being extremely absorbing, and doesn't feel sticky or thick when on the skin. I woke up the next morning super supple and soft! My skin looked hydrated and great. Gifted by Elemis.

reviews.headline: Very hydrating
reviews.comments: The Elemis Pro-Collagen Cream which was gifted by Elemis, has completely transformed my skin. It absorbs quickly, delivers deep hydration, and leaves my complexion looking noticeably firmer and more toned. I've seen a real difference in texture and elasticity, my skin feels smoother, plumper, and more radiant.

reviews.headline: Holy Hydration
reviews.comments: I have very dry and sensitive skin. Once I hit 40 the worse it has gotten. I am like the Sahara Desert and need some fierce hydration in my skincare routine. I am 42 so anything anti-wrinkle is my jam as well.  First off let's talk about Elemis always having beautiful packaging. This night cream is very nice and thick and provides instant hydration to my parched skin. It has a very smooth texture and a very clean scent. In the mornings my skin looks dewy and hydrated just the way I like it. This product was gifted by Elemis for my review. I am a very big fan of your products.

reviews.headline: a must for dry skin
reviews.comments:
I have dry sensitive skin and this night cream is awesome.  I am 46 year old and definitely the collagen in this product helps my skin. It doesn't have a smell either so its perfect for those who are sensitive to scents. It doesn't feel sticky and dries quickly.  Highly recommend
 gifted by

reviews.headline: Great night cream
reviews.comments: This is a very nice and super hydrating night cream. It is not super heavy on the skin but the cream itself has a nice weight to it. I cannot wait to see the difference in my skin when I finish the jar. Gifted by Elemis

reviews.headline: fine lines less visible
reviews.comments: I received this cream as a complimentary from elemis and have been using it every night for the past two weeks. My skin feels more hydrated and glowy in the morning, which makes my fine lines look less noticeable. The texture is creamy but not heavy, and it doesn't clog my pores. I think it could work well for all skin types. It also has a lovely fragrance, though it might not be ideal for those sensitive to scent. So far, I'm really enjoying how it leaves my skin feeling smooth, refreshed, and well-nourished

reviews.headline: My favorite cream pro-collagen
reviews.comments: This cream has a rich, smooth texture that absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy feeling. I love it because it helps keep my skin firm and smooth. It's an anti-aging cream. I love it and highly recommend it. Gifted by Elemis

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: ü©µü§çThank you ELEMIS for gifting me this Pro-Collagen Night cream in exchange for my honest review. As per usual, Elemis delivers with a sleek, classy package. This night cream firms, smooths and replenishes your skin. This cream is recommended to be applied after cleansing, on dry skin. A pea sized amount-so a little goes a long way. I do pick up on some kind of fragrance, but as you're only a small amount, it's not overpowering and it just smells clean. I notice every morning how soft my skin feels after using this cream. It's beautiful. The formula reduces the overall look of fine lines and wrinkles. It just makes your skin feel as though life has been breathed back into it, leaving it plump and soft. Use it every night! The retail ticket cost is reasonable with the amount of product you receive and how long it will last you. If you haven't tried this one, check it out! ü©µü§ç Gifted by Elemis.

reviews.headline: Nice Product
reviews.comments: [Gifted by Elemis] I am a huge fan of Elemis products and this cream is no exception. It feels lovely to use on my skin and also has a nice scent. I love using this as part of my daily nighttime routine! It is a pricey cream though!

reviews.headline: HIGHLY RECOMMEND TO TRY
reviews.comments:
So what I want to say‚Ä¶ THIS IS AMAZING! I love Elemis and their quality, style and how product really works‚Ä¶ ohhhhh I was using this Night cream for almost a month and I love texture , my face feel so hydrated and shiny. I'm the morning face look more fresh and I still don't feel "uncomfortable" after night. This series works and worth every penny. 

Gifted by Elemis

reviews.headline: PM must have cream!
reviews.comments: The pro-collagen night cream is a dream cream! Anti-wrinkle is exactly what my skin needs. The thicker formula is perfect for nighttime cream. Providing hydration and an expectional blend of ingredients helps to maintain skin's optimal condition, firmness, elasticity, to leave a radiant and firmer complexion in the morning. This will now be my PM cream! Gifted by Elemis

reviews.headline: Perfect, Must Have...
reviews.comments: I was gifted by Elemis and Skeepers.  I'm so glad to have gotten the chance to try out the Elemis Pro Collagen Night Cream. I'm a lover of a few other Elemis products. I've been using it for about 12 days and I can already see brighter more plump looking skin. It smells so good like you've gone to the beach in heaven. I have combination skin, this doesn't add any grease or greasy feeling. It's smooth creamy formula absorbs so well and doesn't leave residue on my silk pillowcase. Highly recommend this Night Cream for plumper brighter skin.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have been using this cream for over 20 years.  My husband & I went on a cruise & he treated me to a spa package. They used this cream & I continued to use it to this day. I'm almost 70 years old but my face has no wrinkles & my neck doesn't sag. The cream goes a long way. It is not greasy & it feels wonderful.  I was supposed to get some extra goodies with this order but they weren't in the box.
faceoff_positive.headline: Fantastic cream that feels wonderful!

faceoff_negative.comments: A lovely, lightweight night cream but NOT for acne prone skin types, as I soon discovered. The 2nd ingredient is Glyceryl Stearate SE, an ingredient I try my best to avoid, as it can (though not always) cause acne for me. This was one of the unlucky occasions when my skin did react. I used it for a week and then had to stop as I started to develop the dreaded acne. In that time I must say I loved the texture of the cream, which was neither heavy nor greasy, but a cross between a light cream and a gel. This does have some good stuff in (Vitamin C, E, Shea Butter etc) and also the not-so-good (perfume). As I've experimented with this and discovered, I cannot use it too frequently, for example 2 consecutive nights. At the most just 1 or 2 times a week with a good few days gap in between applications. For those 1 or 2 nights I can get away with it, yes it's brilliant and makes my skin look glowing and nicely hydrated by the next morning, but ultimately I want to be able to use a night cream every night, especially when forking out this much for one. The search for the perfect night cream continues...-> My 'Ulta Beauty Top 7 must-have list' (My 7 favorite beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Ulta) < - < 1. Hair Loss Treatment: Divine Herbal Hair Oil < 2. Eye Cream: Clinique All about eyes < 3. Lip Gloss: Clarins Lip Comfort Oil < 4. Makeup Remover: Lancome Bi Facil < 5. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: Divine Herbal Facial Treatment Serum < 6. Eyeliner: Ulta Beauty Gel Eyeliner Pencil < 7. Moisturizer: 'Lush' ‚Äì Enzymion
faceoff_negative.headline: Good...for occasional use!
